pages.text: $(item)Magic Laudanum$() is an opioid of the arcane kind, just as the name says. Its effect is an essential component for rites requiring a lot of concentration, or rather, a trance. In order for it to affect the cultist, it must, like the Bundle of Herbs, unlike other opioids, be thrown into a flame.
This tincture has the color of deep, dreamless sleep...$(br)I already did such experiments once, though it was not really a pleasure.
